acidity.notes: Fruit, citrus note (not overwhelming). Mouth is completely relaxed (emphasis on completely!!!).

sweetness.notes: Fruit notes are sweet and glowing, sip is delightful to hold over tongue to awhile. High complexity and superb balance.

finish.notes: I've never tasted a finish like this. Immediately my mouth feels refreshed as if I just drank peppermint tea or had listerine. Throat feels coated like with cough syrup. Mouth is completely relaxed, tongue feels soft throughout cup.

flavor: First sip is amazingly 3D, glowy, sweet, round, warbling. Finish is... refreshing, like having one of those listerine sheets. No astringency felt by tongue until latter part of cup.
notes: Very difficult for the Comandante to grind. 8 second vigorous/wide bloom swirl with 70g water. Drawdown was a little faster. Rao spin and tap was a bit more conservative. Some boulders stuck at the top of filter.
